abilities.name: Brutish Rampage
abilities.shortText: On charge, 2+ to deal D3 mortal wounds
abilities.fullText: Roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of this model after this model makes a charge move. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Daemonbound
abilities.fullText: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Daemonbound Blade is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.

effects.effectText: Attack inflicts 1 mortal wound in addition to normal damage

abilities.name: Fuelled by Carnage
abilities.shortText: At end of combat, if models were slain by Hexed Battle-axe, heal D3 wounds
abilities.fullText: At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s Hexed Battle-axe in that phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.

abilities.name: Rune-Etched Plating
abilities.fullText: Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to this model. On a 5+, that mortal wound is negated.

abilities.name: The Knights of Chaos
abilities.shortText: Reroll charge rolls and +1 to hit for a KNIGHTS or CHARIOTS unit
abilities.fullText: You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly CHAOS KNIGHTS, CHAOS CHARIOTS or GOREBEAST CHARIOTS unit wholly within 18" of a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS HERO with this command ability. Until your next hero phase, you can re-roll charge rolls for that unit and add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that unit. The same unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per turn.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.shortText: On charge, roll dice equal to charge. Each 6 = 1MW
abilities.fullText: After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a number of dice equal to the charge roll for that charge move. For each 6, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Insurmountable Strength
abilities.shortText: Roll a dice for each unit with 6" of a terrain feature 6 within 6". 3+ = D3 mortal wounds.
abilities.fullText: In your hero phase, pick 1 terrain feature within 6" of this model and roll a dice for each other unit within 6" of that terrain feature. On a 3+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: The Dark Master
abilities.shortText: Once per battle, in enemy hero phase, curse a hero. Each phase, it can't do anything on a 3+
abilities.fullText: Once per battle, at the start of the enemy hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit on the battlefield. Until your next hero phase, at the start of each phase (including the phase in which the unit was picked), you can roll a dice for that unit. On a 3+, that unit cannot move, shoot, fight, use command abilities, chant prayers, attempt to cast spells, attempt to dispel endless spells or attempt to unbind spells in that phase.

abilities.name: Lord of Torment
abilities.shortText: If an enemy within 12" fails a battleshock test, heal D3
abilities.fullText: If an enemy unit fails a battleshock test while it is within 12" of this model, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.

abilities.name: Shadow Form
abilities.fullText: Ignore modifiers (positive or negative) when making save rolls for attacks that target this model.

effects.effectText: Ignore modifiers when making save rolls

abilities.name: Enfeeble Foe
abilities.shortText: CV 6, Target 1 enemy within 18". -1 to melee wound rolls
abilities.fullText: Enfeeble Foe has a casting value of 6. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by that unit until your next hero phase.

abilities.name: Aspiring Champion
abilities.fullText: 1 model in this unit can be an Aspiring Champion. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.

effects.effectText: +1 melee weapon attacks for the Aspiring Champion

abilities.name: Standard Bearer
abilities.fullText: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.

abilities.name: Hornblower
abilities.fullText: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.

abilities.name: Legions of Chaos
abilities.fullText: Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit while it has at least 10 models.

loadouts.loadoutName: Chaos Hand Weapon and Chaos Runeshield

abilities.name: Chaos Runeshields
abilities.fullText: Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to a unit that carries Chaos Runeshields. On a 5+, that mortal wound is negated.

abilities.name: Chaos Runeshields
abilities.fullText: Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to a unit that carries Chaos Runeshields. On a 5+, that mortal wound is negated.

abilities.name: Pair of Chaos Hand Weapons
abilities.shortText: Reroll hit rolls with Pair of Chaos Hand Weapons
abilities.fullText: You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made with a pair of Chaos Hand Weapons.

effects.effectText: Reroll hit rolls with Pair of Chaos Hand Weapons
